elements.text:
Pro: high visibility due to "sticky" behavior (stays fixed while scrolling).
Cons: smaller creative real estate for branding.

Rationale: users scroll when they’re interested in the content. Fear of losing vertical height is an outdated UX concept. On the most common screen resolutions, this strip does not block functional areas.
